tagline: Charlotte's Premier 24/7 Roof Repair Specialists Since 1980
description: Professional roof repair and emergency roofing services in Charlotte, NC. Family-owned business since 1980 with trained and certified roofing professionals. We offer free inspections and guarantee our work with free labor on any additional repairs needed to ensure customer satisfaction. Specializing in leak repair, storm damage, and preventing costly ceiling damage, structural problems, electrical issues, and black mold.

about.story: Family-owned roofing company serving Charlotte since 1980 with certified professionals and guaranteed workmanship
about.mission: To provide the best roof repair service in Charlotte with emergency response and customer satisfaction guarantee

services_list.name: Emergency Roof Repair
services_list.description: 24/7 emergency roof repair service to prevent costly ceiling damage, structural problems, electrical issues, and black mold. Our certified professionals respond within 4 hours with emergency tarping and immediate leak repair.

services_list.name: Free Roof Inspections
services_list.description: Comprehensive roof inspections with detailed photo documentation and written reports. We identify potential problems before they become major costly issues, helping you maintain your roof's integrity.

services_list.name: Complete Roof Replacement
services_list.description: Full roof replacement using premium materials with certified installation by trained professionals. All work comes with comprehensive warranties and our satisfaction guarantee.

services_list.name: Storm Damage Repair
services_list.description: Specialized storm damage assessment and repair services. We work directly with insurance companies to ensure full coverage and proper restoration of your roof.

services_list.name: Commercial Roofing
services_list.description: Professional commercial roofing services for businesses, warehouses, and industrial facilities. Minimal disruption to your operations with flexible scheduling.

services_list.name: Roof Maintenance
services_list.description: Preventive maintenance programs to extend your roof's lifespan and prevent costly repairs. Regular inspections and minor repairs keep your roof in optimal condition.

testimonials_list.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials_list.title: Homeowner
testimonials_list.content: Roof Solutions saved our home! During last month's severe storm, they responded within 2 hours and had our major leak completely fixed the same day. The team was professional, cleaned up everything, and the price was very fair. I can't recommend them enough!

testimonials_list.name: Mike Chen
testimonials_list.title: Property Manager
testimonials_list.content: We manage over 50 commercial properties and Roof Solutions is our exclusive roofing contractor. Their 24/7 availability, quality workmanship, and fair pricing make them invaluable. They've never let us down in 3 years of partnership.

testimonials_list.name: Jennifer Martinez
testimonials_list.title: Restaurant Owner
testimonials_list.content: Had a major leak during lunch rush that was damaging our kitchen equipment. Roof Solutions had someone here in 90 minutes and fixed it without disrupting our service. Saved us thousands in equipment damage!

testimonials_list.name: Robert & Linda Williams
testimonials_list.title: Homeowners
testimonials_list.content: After 35 years, our roof needed complete replacement. Roof Solutions handled everything - insurance claims, permits, and installation. The crew was respectful, professional, and completed the job in 3 days. Beautiful work!

testimonials_list.name: David Park
testimonials_list.title: IT Director
testimonials_list.content: Free inspection identified problems we didn't even know we had. They could have charged us thousands but only recommended the repairs we actually needed. Honest, reliable service - exactly what you want in a contractor.

testimonials_list.name: Ashley Thompson
testimonials_list.title: Single Mom
testimonials_list.content: Storm damage had me panicked about costs, but Roof Solutions worked directly with my insurance company and made the process stress-free. They even helped me understand what was covered. Above and beyond service!
